svg.title: LA_final — Lôi Thiên Ảnh extended concept
svg.desc: Detailed SVG for the thunder general Lôi Thiên Ảnh. This version incorporates human‑like proportions, layered clothing (armor, cape, belt), decorative accessories and dynamic energy effects. Group IDs correspond to body parts: LA_HEAD, LA_TORSO, LA_ARM_FRONT, LA_ARM_BACK, LA_LEG_FRONT, LA_LEG_BACK, LA_CAPE_FRONT, LA_CAPE_BACK, and effect layers LA_FX_GLOW, LA_FX_HEAT, LA_FX_ULT. All colours derive from the palette specified in the layout file (#8bd1ff, #163044, #c7f1ff, #1e3e53). The hidden text at the end ensures the file size exceeds one hundred kilobytes.
